category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECustomViewDatumPointsColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Defines the ordered list of columns to be displayed for Datum tab in the Manufacturing Features section of the Custom Process view in the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid values are in the format "TypeInternalName.PropertyInternalName", e.g. "Mfg0BvrPLP.Mfg0datum_type", where TypeInternalName is the internal name of a Business Object of type BOMLine, and PropertyInternalName is the property that appears as column.
